author: Joshua Nelson
title: Chris Stirewalt: China will be viewed as 'pariah state' after coronavirus crisis
description: Fox News digital politics editor Chris Stirewalt said on Friday that China’s refusal to share the “severity” of the coronavirus outbreak will be viewed by the world as an "unforgivable error.”
content:
